short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fixes the Pinterest save button on X.com to properly pin with post reference.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PinFix for X

Enhance your Pinterest experience with our new button that seamlessly creates Pinterest posts with direct references to X.com (formerly Twitter) posts. Save and organize your favorite X.com tweets on Pinterest with ease.

Features:

Easy Integration: One-click functionality to add X.com post references to Pinterest boards.
Seamless Sharing: Maintain the original context of X.com posts in your Pinterest collections.
Enhanced Organization: Keep your Pinterest boards updated with relevant X.com content.
Perfect for social media enthusiasts, marketers, and anyone who wants to keep their Pinterest boards fresh and relevant with the latest X.com posts.


If you find out that the pinterest save button doesn't work properly on a website, send me an email to dpineda.dev@gmail.com and i'll try to implement a custom one for that website
